str2: Yet, nevertheless, even. Adverb from the base of homou; at the same time, i.e. notwithstanding, yet still.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Plural
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
A flute, pipe. From the same as aer; a flute.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
A harp, lyre. Of uncertain affinity; a lyre.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A sound. From phtheggomai; utterance, i.e. A musical note.
Distinction, difference, separation. From diastellomai; a variation.
